channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: The Hui
channel.desc: NEW: A compelling mix of current affairs investigations, human interest and arts and culture stories. Made with the support of Te M?ngai P?ho and NZ on Air.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: 1.5 Degrees
channel.desc: Exploring the impact of climate change from the perspective of Rangatahi M?ori. Tessa, a PHD student is researching ways to revitalise Toheroa. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Kids Dont Come With A Manual
channel.desc: A new mum grapples with the possibility that her baby is neurodiverse. Nathan explains that it's a subtle art of looking at patterns of behaviour and seeing if there's enough to warrant diagnosis. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Te Ao with Moana
channel.desc: NEW: Current affairs series that puts a M?ori lens on issues that distinguishes it from other current affairs programmes.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Stylebender
channel.desc: PREMIERE: An intimate look at Israel Adesanya, the Nigerian-born, NZ-based MMA champion that delves deep into his journey and the controversial personality known as 'The Last Stylebender.

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Tapuwae Leave Only Footprints
channel.desc: Pio Terei is on a journey to discover M?ori and Hawaiian indigenous connections through tourism. In this episode we visit, Anelekai Adventures, and Dive Tatapouri. (R).

channel.name: Whakaata Maori NZ
channel.title: Waka Huia
channel.desc: Iconic archival series documenting the unique stories and histories of M?ori. (R).
